role.argrole: thing arg0 pushes arg1 to do

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 到) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (DP (DT 这)) (NP (NN 时候))))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 再)) (VP (VV 拿) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (ADVP (AD 更)) (VP (VA 多)))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 外在)) (NP (NN 标准))))) (VP (VP (MSP 来)) (VP (VV 鞭策) (NP-OBJ (PN 自己))))))) (SP 了))
example.arg: *PRO* 到 了 这 时候
